Enclosing class:
Bing2NewsDocumentSourceDescriptor
public static class Bing2NewsDocumentSourceDescriptor.AttributeBuilder
extends Bing2DocumentSourceDescriptor.AttributeBuilder

Attribute map builder for the Bing2NewsDocumentSource component. You can use this builder as a type-safe alternative to populating the attribute map using attribute keys.
